data.eml:eml: Four new species of the subterranean amphipod genus Stygobromus (Amphipoda: Crangonyctidae) from shallow groundwater habitats on the Coastal Plain and eastern margin of the Piedmont in Maryland and Virginia, USA

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Holsinger, John R., Ansell, Lynnette Meador, Shafer, Justin (2011): Four new species of the subterranean amphipod genus Stygobromus (Amphipoda: Crangonyctidae) from shallow groundwater habitats on the Coastal Plain and eastern margin of the Piedmont in Maryland and Virginia, USA. Zootaxa 2972: 1-21, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205655
